divs: Sighting Detailsmulti-colored flashing objects with minor movement fixed in the western and eastern sky.triangle shaped objects flying usually from 7:30 to 8:30 p.m.(2) yellowish-white objects coing into eastern skies setting up at 5:45 p.m.one stays pretty much stationary while the other moves off from the eastern sky moving west then returning back in the noth-eastern skies 20 or so minetes later.thanks--------
Summary: diamond and triangle objects becoming a regular occurence in our skies
